title: Jonathan Cheban legally changes his name to Instagram handle Foodgod
text:
He is one of Kim Kardashian's closest friends.

And Jonathan Cheban has now officially changed his legal name to his Instagram handle, Foodgod.

The 45-year-old reality star was spotted leaving court in Florida after a judge signed off on the name change.

It's official! Jonathan Cheban has now officially changed his legal name to his Instagram handle, Foodgod

The reality star was seen holding the judge-signed off documents following his visit to a Broward County courthouse.

The official documents list the date it went to effect as his legal name as October 23, 2019.

The star, who regularly makes appearances on Keeping Up With The Kardashians alongside his best friend Kim Kardashian, got the judge's sign off last week.

The name Foodgod was previously just his Instagram handle.

Congrats! The 45-year-old reality star was spotted leaving court in Florida after a judge signed off on the name change

Great news: The reality star was seen holding the judge-signed off documents following his visit to a Broward County courthouse

The star, who has over 3.4 million Instagram followers, now has a trademark symbol next to his Foodgod name on the social media site - which he stylizes as one word with the g lower case.

He left the courthouse last week wearing his own merchandise - a T-shirt that had 'Foodgod' emblazoned on the front.

On Sunday, the Foodgod shared a video to his Instagram promoting a mattress as he woke up with pizza, a burger and a donut next to him him.

It's official: The star, who has over 3.4 million Instagram followers, now has a trademark symbol next to his name which he stylizes as one word with the g lower cased

Stepping out: The official documents list the date it went to effect as his legal name as October 23, 2019

Where it happened: The star, who regularly makes appearances on Keeping Up With The Kardashians alongside his best friend Kim Kardashian, got the judge's sign off last week

A dream? On Sunday, the Foodgod shared a video to his Instagram promoting a mattress as he woke up with pizza, a burger and donuts next to him him

Last year, Jonathan shared a snap of a delectable slice of cake - showing off his 'foodgod' tattoo on his forearm.

The star became a household name while starring on Keeping Up With The Kardashians.

He also hosts his new podcast called Foodgod: OMFG; his first guest for his September launched project was Kim Kardashian herself.

Dedication: Last year, Jonathan shared a snap of a delectable slice of cake - showing off his 'foodgod' tattoo on his forearm

Strike a pose: The star became a household name while starring on Keeping Up With The Kardashians; pictured February 26, 2012 at the 20th Annual Elton John AIDS Foundation Academy Awards Viewing Party
description: He is one of Kim Kardashian's closest friends. And Jonathan Cheban has now officially changed his legal name to his Instagram handle, Foodgod.
